author: novusB
name: OSRSStats
short: Old School RuneScape player statistics lookup
description: A RedBot cog that fetches and displays Old School RuneScape player statistics from the official hiscores API. Features include overall stats display, individual skill lookup, boss kill counts, and formatted Discord embeds.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg: Thank you for installing OSRSStats! Use `!osrs <username>` to get player stats or `!osrsskill <username> <skill>` for detailed skill information.
